Medford.House at 42 Vinal Avenue: The House at 42 Vinal Avenue in Somerville, Massachusetts is a well-preserved Shingle style house. It is a 2-1/2 story wood frame structure, roughly square in shape, with a cross-gable roof. The roof line of the front-facing gable extends downward to the first floor on the right, sheltering a porch on the building's right front.
